code:
[BEGIN]
```verilog
module TopModule (
    input logic p1a,
    input logic p1b,
    input logic p1c,
    input logic p1d,
    input logic p2a,
    input logic p2b,
    input logic p2c,
    input logic p2d,
    output logic p1y,
    output logic p2y
);

    // Implementing the functionality of two 4-input NAND gates
    always @(*) begin
        p1y = ~(p1a & p1b & p1c & p1d); // p1y is the NAND of p1 inputs
        p2y = ~(p2a & p2b & p2c & p2d); // p2y is the NAND of p2 inputs
    end

endmodule
```
[DONE]
